actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National High School Seniors Voter Registration Day and recognizing annually the first Tuesday in May as National High School Seniors' Voter Registration Day.

summary.text: This resolution supports the goals and ideals of National High School Seniors Voter Registration Day. It also encourages all eligible students to register to vote.

titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National High School Seniors Voter Registration Day and recognizing annually the first Tuesday in May as National High School Seniors' Voter Registration Day.
